Tix Documentation Index

This file is the index of all the documentation included in this Tix source release package. For additional information about Tix, please visit the Tix Home Page at http://tix.sourceforge.net.

Tix is open-source software. See license.terms for details.

General Documents

  • ABOUT.html
    A brief descriptions of Tix.

  • docs/Release.html
    Important release notes about this version of Tix.

  • license.terms
    Licensing terms and a disclaimer of all liabilities. You should use Tix only if you agree to all of its licensing terms.

  • ChangeLog
    A log of changes made to Tix.

Build Instructions

  • unix/README.txt
    Build instruction for Unix/Linux and OS X platforms.

  • win/README.txt
    Build instruction for Win32 platforms.

Programming with Tix

  • docs/html/TixUser/TixUser.html
    Tix Users's Guide. An introduction to Tix under Python or Tcl.
    Also available in PDF.

  • docs/tix-book/tix.book.html
    Tix Programmer's Guide. It was written for Tix 4.0, but most of its contents are still relevant for this version of Tix.

  • man/html/contents.htm
    Tix Reference Manual.

  • docs/FAQ.html
    Frequent Asked Questions about Tix.

  • tools/README.html
    Useful development tools included in this package

Our Web Site

To contact the Tix Project Group, reach your fellow Tix users, submit patches or bug reports, and find a range of other information, please visit our web site at http://tix.sourceforge.net .
Tix Home Page
